trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.GetDesignModeState" /> method returns <see langword="null" /> by default.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.GetDesignModeState" />方法返回<see langword="null" />默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method to provide the design-time data your control requires.
trans-unit.target: 你必须重写该方法以提供您控件要求设计时数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL that corresponds to a set of route parameters, and optionally to a route name.
trans-unit.target: 获取与一组路由参数对应的 URL，以及（可选）与路由名称对应的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for coding convenience.
trans-unit.target: 提供此方法是为了方便编码。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 它等效于调用<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 路由参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL that corresponds to a set of route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 获取与一组路由参数对应的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL that corresponds to the specified route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 与指定路由参数对应的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for coding convenience.
trans-unit.target: 提供此方法是为了方便编码。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 它等效于调用<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method converts the object that is passed in `routeParameters` to a <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary> object by using the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary.%23ctor%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此方法中传递的对象转换为`routeParameters`到<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary>通过使用对象<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary.%23ctor%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.GetRouteUrl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to get the URL of a route that has parameters that are named `productid` and `category`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.GetRouteUrl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以获取已命名的参数的路由的 URL`productid`和`category`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control that is named `HyperLink1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件名为`HyperLink1`。

trans-unit.source: The route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 路由参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL that corresponds to a set of route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 获取与一组路由参数对应的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL that corresponds to the specified route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 与指定路由参数对应的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for coding convenience.
trans-unit.target: 提供此方法是为了方便编码。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 它等效于调用<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this method to get the URL of a route that has parameters that are named `productid` and `category`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用此方法以获取已命名的参数的路由的 URL`productid`和`category`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control that is named `HyperLink1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件名为`HyperLink1`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the route.
trans-unit.target: 路由的名称。

trans-unit.source: The route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 路由参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL that corresponds to a set of route parameters and a route name.
trans-unit.target: 获取与一组路由参数以及某个路由名称对应的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL that corresponds to the specified route parameters and route name.
trans-unit.target: 与指定路由参数和路由名称对应的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for coding convenience.
trans-unit.target: 提供此方法是为了方便编码。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 它等效于调用<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method converts the object that is passed in `routeParameters` to a <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary> object by using the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary.%23ctor%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此方法中传递的对象转换为`routeParameters`到<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary>通过使用对象<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary.%23ctor%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this method to get the URL of a route that is named `Product` and has parameters that are named `productid` and `category`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用此方法以获取名为的路由的 URL`Product`和已命名的参数`productid`和`category`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control that is named `HyperLink1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件名为`HyperLink1`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the route.
trans-unit.target: 路由的名称。

trans-unit.source: The route parameters.
trans-unit.target: 路由参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL that corresponds to a set of route parameters and a route name.
trans-unit.target: 获取与一组路由参数以及某个路由名称对应的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The URL that corresponds to the specified route parameters and route name.
trans-unit.target: 与指定路由参数和路由名称对应的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for coding convenience.
trans-unit.target: 提供此方法是为了方便编码。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 它等效于调用<xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection.GetVirtualPath%28System.Web.Routing.RequestContext%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this method to get the URL of a route that is named `Product` and has parameters that are named `productid` and `category`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用此方法以获取名为的路由的 URL`Product`和已命名的参数`productid`和`category`。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control that is named `HyperLink1`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定你已创建了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件名为`HyperLink1`。

trans-unit.source: A control that is within a naming container.
trans-unit.target: 位于命名容器内的控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the prefixed portion of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID" /> property of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定控件的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID" /> 属性的前缀部分。

trans-unit.source: The prefixed portion of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID" /> property of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 指定控件的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID" /> 属性的前缀部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> property of a control is generated by adding a prefix to the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>通过将前缀添加到控件的生成控件的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The prefix is composed of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> property of the control's naming container concatenated with a separator character.
trans-unit.target: 前缀组成<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>的控件属性的命名容器使用分隔符的字符相串联的查询。

trans-unit.source: If the naming container is the page, there is no prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果命名的容器是页，没有前缀。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the prefix string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的前缀字符串。

trans-unit.source: If there is no prefix string, it returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有任何前缀字符串，它将返回<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>控件的值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer" /> property of <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="control" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="control" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current server control's child controls have any saved view-state settings.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前服务器控件的子控件是否具有任何已保存的视图状态设置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if any child controls have saved view state information; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何子控件具有已保存的视图状态信息，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can avoid unnecessary calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A> method by using this property to verify that any child controls of the server control are storing view-state information.
trans-unit.target: 你可以避免不必要调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A>方法通过使用此属性使用，以验证服务器控件的任何子控件是否存储视图状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the server control contains any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 确定服务器控件是否包含任何子控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control contains other controls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件包含其他控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Since this method simply determines if any child controls exist, it can enhance performance by allowing you to avoid an unnecessary <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A> property call.
trans-unit.target: 由于此方法仅确定是否存在任何子控件，它可以增强性能，因为它允许你可以避免不必要<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A>属性调用。

trans-unit.source: Calls to this property require a <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object to be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 对此属性的调用需要<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>要实例化的对象。

trans-unit.source: If there are no children, this object creation wastes server resources.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有子节点，创建该对象会浪费服务器资源。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls%2A> method to determine if any controls exist before using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A> property to iterate through a <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls%2A>方法来确定在使用之前是否存在任何控件<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A>属性来循环访问<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls" /> method should be overridden only to change metadata attributes such as <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls" />应重写方法，只是为了更改元数据属性，例如<see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether events are registered for the control or any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否为控件或任何子控件注册事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if events are registered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果注册事件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the programmatic identifier assigned to the server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置分配给服务器控件的编程标识符。

trans-unit.source: The programmatic identifier assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: 分配给控件的编程标识符。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property on a server control provides you with programmatic access to the server control's properties, events, and methods.
trans-unit.target: 服务器控件上设置此属性提供以编程方式访问服务器控件的属性、 事件和方法。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set by Web developers by declaring an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> attribute in the opening tag of an ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过声明的 Web 开发人员设置此属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>的 ASP.NET 服务器控件的开始标记中的属性。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not specified for a server control, either declaratively or programmatically, you can obtain a reference to the control through its parent control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定的服务器控件，此属性，以声明方式或以编程方式，可以获取对通过其父控件的控件的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Only combinations of alphanumeric characters and the underscore character ( _ ) are valid values for this property.
trans-unit.target: 字母数字字符和下划线字符 (_) 的唯一组合都是此属性的有效值。

trans-unit.source: Including spaces or other invalid characters will cause an ASP.NET page parser error.
trans-unit.target: 包括空格或者其他无效字符会导致 ASP.NET 页分析器错误。

trans-unit.source: Gets the character used to separate control identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于分隔控件标识符的字符。

trans-unit.source: The separator character.
trans-unit.target: 分隔符字符。

trans-unit.source: The default is "$".
trans-unit.target: 默认为“$”。

trans-unit.source: The character contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IdSeparator%2A> property is used to separate the control identifiers for child controls.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的字符<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IdSeparator%2A>属性用于分隔的子控件的控件标识符。

trans-unit.source: The ID separator character is appended to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ID 分隔符字符追加到<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the server control is initialized, which is the first step in its lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: 当服务器控件初始化时发生；初始化是控件生存期的第一步。

trans-unit.source: Server controls should perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance.
trans-unit.target: 服务器控件应执行任何所需创建并设置实例的初始化步骤。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use view-state information within this event; it is not populated yet.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用此事件; 内的视图状态信息不尚未填充。

trans-unit.source: You should not access another server control during this event, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control.
trans-unit.target: 不应在此事件，不管它是子或对此控件的父期间访问另一个服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.
trans-unit.target: 其他服务器控件也不一定能够将创建并可供访问。

trans-unit.source: For more information on server control events, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Server Control Event Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3).
trans-unit.target: 服务器控件事件的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体服务器控件事件模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6304bff7-1b0e-4641-8acb-6d3b0badc4a3)。

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns a custom event handler, `Calendar_Init`, to the `Init` event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将自定义事件处理程序，`Calendar_Init`到`Init`事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether controls contained within this control have control state.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示该控件中包含的控件是否具有控件状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if children of this control do not use control state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该控件的子级不使用控件状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the server control holds only literal content.
trans-unit.target: 确定服务器控件是否只包含文字内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the server control contains solely literal content; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器控件只包含文本内容，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns `true`, the server control's collection holds a single literal control.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法返回`true`，服务器控件的集合包含单个文本控件。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks whether the page that contains the server controls has posted back.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检查包含的服务器控件的页是否已回。

trans-unit.source: If it has, it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsLiteralContent%2A> method to determine whether the control contains just literal content, or is a parent control to other server controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有，则会调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsLiteralContent%2A>方法来确定是否控件只包含文本内容或其他服务器控件的父控件。

trans-unit.source: If it contains solely literal content, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> that represents that content is written to the response.
trans-unit.target: 如果它只包含文本内容，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>表示此内容写入到响应。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the server control is saving changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，用于指示服务器控件是否会将更改保存到其视图状态中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is marked to save its state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件标记为保存其状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For a sample custom server control that uses this property, see [Templated Server Control Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/986f63b8-6b50-42b9-a62d-a2f13cafa88b)
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性的自定义服务器控件示例，请参阅[模板化的服务器控件示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/986f63b8-6b50-42b9-a62d-a2f13cafa88b)

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method in a custom ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>自定义的 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的方法。

trans-unit.source: It begins by calling the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A> method and then uses the `ControlCollection` object.
trans-unit.target: 它首先调用基<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A>方法，然后使用`ControlCollection`对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to delete all the child controls and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A> method to delete any saved view-state settings for those child controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 若要删除所有子控件的方法和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A>方法以都删除所有视图状态的设置保存这些子控件。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 最后，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The control then uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property to determine whether view-state change tracking is enabled for the control.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该控件使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>属性来确定是否为控件启用视图状态更改跟踪。

trans-unit.source: If it is not enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果未启用，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether view state is enabled for this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否为该控件启用了视图状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if view state is enabled for the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为控件启用了视图状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: View state can be enabled at the page, container, or control level.
trans-unit.target: 可以在页、 容器或控制级别启用视图状态。

trans-unit.source: When view state is disabled at the page or container level, view state is disabled for all controls contained by the page or container.
trans-unit.target: 当在页面或容器级别禁用视图状态时，包含的页面或容器的所有控件禁用了视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> property indicates whether view state is enabled by pages, containers, or controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>属性指示是否通过页、 容器或控件启用视图状态。

trans-unit.source: It is possible for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> property to be different.
trans-unit.target: 之所以<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>属性不同。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> containing the control has view state disabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property can be `true` while the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>包含控件禁用了视图状态，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>属性可以是`true`时<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled%2A>属性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Page developers will set the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode" /> property to indicate whether they are using view state with your control.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员将设置<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState" />属性和<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode" />属性以指示它们是否都与控件一同使用视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode" /> property in your code to determine whether view state is enabled for your control and for all containers.
trans-unit.target: 使用<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.IsViewStateEnabled" />属性和<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode" />代码来确定是否已启用视图状态，为您的控件和的所有容器的属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the server control is loaded into the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 当服务器控件加载到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 对象中时发生。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the server control to perform any processing steps that are set to occur on each page request.
trans-unit.target: 通知服务器控件以执行任何设置为在每个页请求上发生的处理步骤。

trans-unit.source: You can access view state information and Web form POST data from this event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以从此事件中访问视图状态信息和 Web 窗体 POST 数据。

trans-unit.source: You can also access other server controls within the page's control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以访问该页面的控制层次结构中其他服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: If you set a custom template in a control during the `Page_Load` event, the text values of child controls in the custom template will be lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置在控件中的自定义模板`Page_Load`事件，自定义模板中的子控件的文本值将会丢失。

trans-unit.source: This occurs because the form values have already been loaded.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为已加载的窗体值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: 表示要还原的控件状态的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Restores control-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveControlState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveControlState" /> 方法保存的上一个页请求还原控件状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Override this method when you need to specify how a custom server control restores its control state.
trans-unit.target: 当您需要指定自定义服务器控件还原其控件状态的方式时，重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState%2A> method in a custom ASP.NET control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例替代<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState%2A>自定义 ASP.NET 控件中的方法。

trans-unit.source: When this method is invoked, it determines whether control state was previously saved for the control and, if so, sets the internal property `currentIndex` to the saved value.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此方法时，它确定是否控件状态以前保存的控件，如果是这样，设置的内部属性`currentIndex`为保存的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method is overridden to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A> to indicate that the custom control uses control state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>重写方法以调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A>以指示该自定义控件使用控件状态。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: 表示要还原的控件状态的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 从用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState" /> 方法保存的上一个页面请求还原视图状态信息。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A> method for a custom ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A>的自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: It creates an <xref:System.Object> array to contain the view state information passed in the `savedState` parameter, and then calls the base implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A> method for the first index location of the array.
trans-unit.target: 它将创建<xref:System.Object>数组以包含传递中的视图状态信息`savedState`参数，然后调用基实现的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A>数组的第一个索引位置的方法。

trans-unit.source: It assigns the values stored at the next two index locations to variables named `UserText` and `PasswordText`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 它将存储在下面的两个索引位置到名为的变量的值分配`UserText`和`PasswordText`分别。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control participates in loading its view state by <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> instead of index.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否通过 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 而不是索引参与加载其视图状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control loads its view state by <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件通过 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 加载其视图状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, when a parent control loads view state into child controls it creates, it does this by the position of each child control in the parent control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当父控件将视图状态加载到子控件创建，这是通过在父控件中的每个子控件位置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: When view state is initially applied, all child controls might not have been created.
trans-unit.target: 当最初应用视图状态时，所有子控件可能不会已创建。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the view state for controls not yet created is saved, and applied when the child controls are created later.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，还未创建控件的视图状态保存，并应用更高版本创建的子控件时。

trans-unit.source: For a parent control to apply view state to its child controls, two conditions must be met:
trans-unit.target: 将视图状态应用于其子控件的父控件，必须满足两个条件：

trans-unit.source: On postback, the parent control must create the child controls in exactly the same order as the previous request so that the order of the controls remains consistent.
trans-unit.target: 在回发时，父控件必须创建子控件以在上一个请求的顺序完全相同，以便控件的顺序保持一致。

trans-unit.source: After postback, any child controls created must be added to the end of the parent control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 回发后，创建所有子控件必须都添加到父控件的末尾<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If these two conditions cannot be met, as in the case of the delayed creation of a child control, the parent control can load view state by using <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不满足这两个条件，如创建操作的子控件延迟，父控件可以使用加载视图状态<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A> property to `true`, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateModeByIdAttribute> metadata attribute for the parent control.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewStateByID%2A>属性`true`，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateModeByIdAttribute>的父控件的元数据属性。

trans-unit.source: A relative or root relative URL.
trans-unit.target: 相对 URL 或相对于根的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the physical path that a virtual path, either absolute or relative, maps to.
trans-unit.target: 检索虚拟路径（绝对的或相对的）映射到的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: The physical path to the requested file.
trans-unit.target: 请求文件的物理路径。

trans-unit.source: This method can only be used by server controls that have permissions to read files and which are part of fully trusted .dll files, such as System.Web.dll.
trans-unit.target: 此方法只能由服务器控件具有读取文件权限并且这是完全受信任的.dll 文件，如 System.Web.dll 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: This helps prevent security breaches.
trans-unit.target: 这有助于防止安全漏洞的威胁。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.MapPathSecure%2A> method to obtain the physical path of a virtual directory of the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> or <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.MapPathSecure%2A>方法来获取包含虚拟目录的物理路径<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>或<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="virtualPath" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 或空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the server control's naming container, which creates a unique namespace for differentiating between server controls with the same <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: 获取对服务器控件的命名容器的引用，此引用创建唯一的命名空间，以区分具有相同 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ID" /> 属性值的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The server control's naming container.
trans-unit.target: 服务器控件的命名容器。

trans-unit.source: Each page in an ASP.NET Web application contains a hierarchy of controls.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Web 应用程序中的每页包含控件层次的结构。

trans-unit.source: This hierarchy is not dependent on whether a control generates UI visible to the user.
trans-unit.target: 此层次结构不依赖于与控件是否生成对用户可见的 UI。

trans-unit.source: The naming container for a given control is the parent control above it in the hierarchy that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: 给定控件的命名容器是其上实现的层次结构中的父控件<xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>接口。

trans-unit.source: A server control that implements this interface creates a unique namespace for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property values of its child server controls.
trans-unit.target: 实现此接口的服务器控件创建的唯一命名空间<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>子服务器控件的属性值。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> property of a naming container's child control to get a reference to its parent container.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>要获取其父容器的引用的命名容器的子控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creating a unique namespace for server controls is particularly important when you bind Web server controls to data, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> server controls.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将 Web 服务器控件绑定到数据，如创建服务器控件的唯一命名空间是特别重要<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: When multiple entries in the data source create multiple instances of a server control that is a child of the repeating control, the naming container ensures that each instance of these child controls have <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> property values that do not conflict.
trans-unit.target: 当数据源中的多个条目创建一个是重复的控件的子级的服务器控件的多个实例时，可确保命名容器的这些子控件的每个实例都具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>不会发生冲突的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The default naming container for a page is the instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class that is generated when that page is requested.
trans-unit.target: 页的默认命名容器是实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>请求该页面时，将生成的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> property contains the value that is rendered as the element's `id` attribute in the HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>属性包含呈现为元素的值`id`的 HTML 标记中的属性。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value that you assign to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> property, the value that is generated for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> property might include the ID of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 根据分配到的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>属性，为生成的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>属性可能包含的 ID<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>对象。

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> to <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Static>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value does not include the ID of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>到<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Static>、<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>值不包括的 ID<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>对象。

trans-unit.source: When you set <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A> to either <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.AutoID> or <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A> value will include the ID from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientIDMode%2A>为<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.AutoID>或<xref:System.Web.UI.ClientIDMode.Predictable>、<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>值将包括来自的 ID<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Server Control Identification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 服务器控件标识](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45a8c3ef-5ac7-48f1-862a-0cd5073742e7)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.NamingContainer%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the server control is passed up the page's UI server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 确定服务器控件的事件是否沿页的 UI 服务器控件层次结构向上传递。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件已被取消，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET server controls such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> Web controls can contain child controls that raise events.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 服务器控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>Web 控件可以包含引发事件的子控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, each row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can contain one or more buttons created dynamically by templates.
trans-unit.target: 例如中的每一行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件可以包含动态创建的模板的一个或多个按钮。

trans-unit.source: Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are "bubbled"—that is, they are sent to the naming container.
trans-unit.target: 而不是单独引发事件的每个按钮，嵌套的控件中的事件"冒泡"— 也就是说，它们被发送到命名的容器。

trans-unit.source: The naming container in turn raises a generic event called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> with parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 命名容器反过来引发调用的泛型事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>使用的参数值。

trans-unit.source: These values allow you to determine which individual control that raised the original event.
trans-unit.target: 这些值，可以确定哪些引发原始事件的单个控件。

trans-unit.source: By responding to this single event, you can avoid having to write individual event-handling methods for child controls.
trans-unit.target: 通过对此单个事件做出反应，可以避免无需编写各个子控件的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A> method in a custom ASP.NET server control, `ParentControl`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A>中自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件，方法`ParentControl`。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked when a child control of `ParentControl` calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 子控件时，会调用此方法`ParentControl`调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When this happens, the `ParentControl` class writes two strings to the containing ASP.NET page, the first stating that its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A> method has been called, the second identifying the source control of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，`ParentControl`类将写入包含 ASP.NET 页中，第一个指出两个字符串，其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A>方法被调用，第二个标识的源控制<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method notifies a server control to perform any logic for binding data that is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通知服务器控件，若要执行的任何逻辑，用于将与之关联的数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: If you want to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event, you should override this event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要处理<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>事件，应重写此事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that all delegates attached to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event are invoked.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保所有委托都附加到<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>事件调用。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A> method to add child controls to the parent control from a data source.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A>方法将从数据源添加到父控件的子控件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 调用此方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing a custom control, you can override this method in order to provide additional processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在开发一个自定义控件，你可以重写此方法以提供额外的处理。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, call the base control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method to notify subscribers to the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重写此方法，调用基控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>方法通知订户的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Load" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 调用此方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing a custom control, you can override this method in order to provide additional processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在开发一个自定义控件，你可以重写此方法以提供额外的处理。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, call the base control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad%2A> method to notify subscribers to the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重写此方法，调用基控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnLoad%2A>方法通知订户的事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 调用此方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing a custom control, you can override this method in order to provide additional processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在开发一个自定义控件，你可以重写此方法以提供额外的处理。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, call the base control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method to notify subscribers to the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重写此方法，调用基控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>方法通知订户的事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload> event.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 调用此方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload>事件。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing a custom control, you can override this method in order to provide additional processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在开发一个自定义控件，你可以重写此方法以提供额外的处理。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, call the base control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnUnload%2A> method to notify subscribers to the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重写此方法，调用基控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnUnload%2A>方法通知订户的事件。

trans-unit.source: The path to the desired file.
trans-unit.target: 所需文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> used to read a file.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于读取文件的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that references the desired file.
trans-unit.target: 引用所需文件的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OpenFile%2A> method returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object that can be used to read the contents of the file specified in the `path` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OpenFile%2A>方法返回<xref:System.IO.Stream>可以用于读取中指定的文件的内容对象`path`参数。

trans-unit.source: The path parameter can be either a relative or root URL without a protocol (such as "~/mySite/myFile.txt), or a physical path, either local ("c:\mySite\myFile.txt") or UNC ("\\\myServer\myFile.txt").
trans-unit.target: Path 参数可以是相对或没有协议根 URL (如"~ / mySite/myFile.txt)，或物理路径，本地 ("c:\mySite\myFile.txt") 或 UNC ("\\\myServer\myFile.txt")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OpenFile%2A> method uses file access security to control access to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OpenFile%2A>方法使用文件访问安全性来控制对指定的文件的访问。

trans-unit.source: If the current ASP.NET user does not have access to the file, then the file is not opened and an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown to indicate that access was denied.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的 ASP.NET 用户则无权访问该文件，则不打开文件和<xref:System.Web.HttpException>异常引发来指示访问被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: If the `path` parameter specified a relative path, the exception does not include information about the physical path to the requested file.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`参数指定的相对路径，该异常不包括有关请求的文件的物理路径的信息。

trans-unit.source: Access to the specified file was denied.
trans-unit.target: 对指定文件的访问被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance that contains the server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对包含服务器控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 实例的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance that contains the server control.
trans-unit.target: 包含服务器控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: This property's value reflects the name of the .aspx file that contains the server control.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值反映了包含服务器控件的.aspx 文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将会重写 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法。

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> property to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and determine whether the page that contains this control has just been loaded for the first time or is the result of a postback.
trans-unit.target: 它使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>属性来访问<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsPostBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性并确定是否包含此控件的页只是已加载第一次，或者是否回发的结果。

trans-unit.source: The control is a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 该控件为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the server control's parent control in the page control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 获取对页 UI 层次结构中服务器控件的父控件的引用。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the server control's parent control.
trans-unit.target: 对服务器控件的父控件的引用。

trans-unit.source: Whenever a page is requested, a hierarchy of server controls on that page is built.
trans-unit.target: 每当请求页时，生成的该页面上的服务器控件层次结构。

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to determine the parent control of the current server control in that hierarchy, and to program against it.
trans-unit.target: 此属性，可确定当前的服务器控件在该层次结构，并对其的程序的父控件。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets a new <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object on a page, `myControl1`, to the control specified in a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置新<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>在页中，对象`myControl1`，在指定的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法调用。

trans-unit.source: If the call returns a control, the code uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Parent%2A> property to identify the control that contains `myControl1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用返回一个控件，该代码使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Parent%2A>属性来标识该控件包含`myControl1`。

trans-unit.source: If the parent control exists, the string "The parent of the text box is" is concatenated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the parent control and written to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在父控件，字符串"文本框的父 is"的末端与<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>父控件的属性，并且写入到<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If no parent control is found, the string "Control not found" is written.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到没有父控件，则字符串"控件找不到"编写。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> object is loaded but prior to rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在加载 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> 对象之后、呈现之前发生。

trans-unit.source: Use this event to perform any updates before the server control is rendered to the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用此事件的服务器控件呈现到页之前执行的任何更新。

trans-unit.source: Any changes in the view state of the server control can be saved during this event.
trans-unit.target: 可以在此事件期间保存服务器控件的视图状态中的任何更改。

trans-unit.source: Such changes made in the rendering phase will not be saved.
trans-unit.target: 此类在呈现阶段所做的更改将不保存。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Assigns any sources of the event and its information to the control's parent.
trans-unit.target: 将所有事件源及其信息分配给控件的父级。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET server controls such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> Web controls can contain child controls that raise events.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 服务器控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>Web 控件可以包含引发事件的子控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, each row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can contain one or more buttons created dynamically by templates.
trans-unit.target: 例如中的每一行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件可以包含动态创建的模板的一个或多个按钮。

trans-unit.source: Rather than each button raising an event individually, events from the nested controls are "bubbled"—that is, they are sent to the control's parent.
trans-unit.target: 而不是单独引发事件的每个按钮，嵌套的控件中的事件"冒泡"— 也就是说，它们被发送到控件的父级。

trans-unit.source: The parent in turn raises a generic event called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> with parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 父反过来引发调用的泛型事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>使用的参数值。

trans-unit.source: These values allow you to determine which individual control that raised the original event.
trans-unit.target: 这些值，可以确定哪些引发原始事件的单个控件。

trans-unit.source: By responding to this single event, you can avoid having to write individual event-handling methods for child controls.
trans-unit.target: 通过对此单个事件做出反应，可以避免无需编写各个子控件的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: While you cannot override this method, controls you author can handle or raise bubbled events by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 创作的控件时不能重写此方法，可以处理或通过重写引发冒泡的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrate how to create a custom class, `ChildControl`, overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.OnClick%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A> method that sends the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to its parent ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义类， `ChildControl`，重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.OnClick%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A>方法发送<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click?displayProperty=nameWithType>到其父 ASP.NET 服务器控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks a button in an ASP.NET page that includes an instance of `ChildControl`, it raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A> method on the parent control that contains the instance of `ChildControl` and writes the string "The ChildControl class OnClick method is called" to the page.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击 ASP.NET 页，其中包含的实例中的按钮`ChildControl`，它会发出<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A>方法包含的实例的父控件`ChildControl`并将字符串"ChildControl 类 OnClick 方法调用"到页。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> that has been removed.
trans-unit.target: 已被移除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: Called after a child control is removed from the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> collection of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> 对象的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls" /> 集合移除子控件后调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RemovedControl%2A> method is called immediately after a control is removed from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RemovedControl%2A>从移除控件后立即调用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The control is a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 该控件为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object that receives the server control content.
trans-unit.target: 用于接收服务器控件内容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Sends server control content to a provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object, which writes the content to be rendered on the client.
trans-unit.target: 将服务器控件内容发送到给定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象，该对象可编写将在客户端呈现的内容。

trans-unit.source: When developing custom server controls, you can override this method to generate content for an ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 当开发自定义服务器控件，你可以重写此方法以生成 ASP.NET 页的内容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls%2A> method is used to determine whether the server control has any child controls stored in its <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object, which is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls%2A>方法用于确定服务器控件是否具有任何子控件，存储在其<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>对象，它是可通过访问<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls%2A> returns true and the first server control in the collection is literal text, then the literal text is appended to an HTML string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.HasControls%2A>返回 true，则集合中的第一个服务器控件是文字文本，则文字文本追加到一个 HTML 字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象，用于接收呈现内容。

trans-unit.source: Outputs the content of a server control's children to a provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object, which writes the content to be rendered on the client.
trans-unit.target: 将服务器控件子级的内容输出到提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象，此对象编写将在客户端呈现的内容。

trans-unit.source: This method notifies ASP.NET to render any Active Server Pages (ASP) code on the page.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通知 ASP.NET 呈现页面上的任何 Active Server Pages (ASP) 代码。

trans-unit.source: If no ASP code exists on the page, this method renders any child controls for the server control.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有 ASP 代码存在页上，此方法会呈现任何子服务器控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> method in a custom server control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>自定义服务器控件中的方法。

trans-unit.source: It determines whether the current control has any child controls in its <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前控件是否有任何子控件其<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>对象。

trans-unit.source: If it does, it uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A> property to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果是这样，它使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A>属性来循环访问集合。

trans-unit.source: As it encounters each child control, it uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl%2A> method to render the parent control, and all of its child controls, to the containing page.
trans-unit.target: 当它遇到每个子控件，它使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl%2A>方法呈现父控件及其所有子控件，到包含页。

trans-unit.source: The overridden <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A> method then calls the overridden <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A>方法然后调用重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Outputs server control content and stores tracing information about the control if tracing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 输出服务器控件内容，并存储有关此控件的跟踪信息（如果已启用跟踪）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object that receives the control content.
trans-unit.target: 接收控件内容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Outputs server control content to a provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object and stores tracing information about the control if tracing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 将服务器控件内容输出到所提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象，如果启用了跟踪，则还将存储有关该控件的跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: If a server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property is set to `true`, this method determines whether tracing is enabled for the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>属性设置为`true`，此方法可确定是否启用页跟踪。

trans-unit.source: If so, it stores trace information associated with the control, and renders the server control content to the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果是这样，它将存储与该控件关联的跟踪信息，并呈现到页的服务器控件内容。

trans-unit.source: This method is automatically called by the page during the rendering, but can be overridden by custom control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法自动期间由调用页呈现，但可以重写通过自定义控件开发人员。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A> method in a custom server control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A>自定义服务器控件中的方法。

trans-unit.source: It determines whether the current control has any child controls in its <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前控件是否有任何子控件其<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>对象。

trans-unit.source: If it does, it uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A> property to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果是这样，它使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Count%2A>属性来循环访问集合。

trans-unit.source: As it encounters each child control, it uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl%2A> method to render the child control, and all of its child controls, to the containing page.
trans-unit.target: 当它遇到每个子控件，它使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl%2A>方法呈现子控件及其所有子控件，到包含页。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter> object that is passed to this method is instantiated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Render%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter>通过传递给此方法的对象实例化<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Render%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the control content.
trans-unit.target: 接收控件内容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter" /> that defines the rendering.
trans-unit.target: 定义呈现的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter" />。

trans-unit.source: Outputs server control content to a provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object using a provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象将服务器控件内容输出到提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Web pages are usable across a wide range of devices and browsers that can request information from the Web.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Web 页是可用在各种设备和浏览器可以从 Web 请求信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter> object that renders the control on the requesting device or browser's screen.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>呈现请求设备或浏览器的屏幕上的控件的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about adapters, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).
trans-unit.target: 有关适配器的详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。

trans-unit.source: If a server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property is set to `true` and tracing is enabled for the page, then trace information associated with the control is captured.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>属性设置为`true`对页上，启用跟踪，然后捕获与控件关联的跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter,System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter)" /> method in custom controls, call the base class method to ensure trace information is correctly captured.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter,System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter)" />自定义控件中的方法调用基类方法，以确保正确捕获跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies the ASP.NET version that rendered HTML will be compatible with.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定呈现的 HTML 将与之兼容的 ASP.NET 版本。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET version that rendered HTML will be compatible with.
trans-unit.target: 呈现的 HTML 将与之兼容的 ASP.NET 版本。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET sets this property to the value of the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the `pages` element in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 将此属性设置为的值`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`属性`pages`Web.config 文件中的元素。

trans-unit.source: If the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute is not set in the Web.config file, the default value is the current version of ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 如果`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`Web.config 文件中未设置属性，默认值是 ASP.NET 的当前版本。

trans-unit.source: There is a public set accessor for this property, but the set accessor supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 没有公共的 set 访问器为此属性，但 set 访问器支持的.NET Framework 基础结构，不宜在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: If you set this value in your code, the effect is unpredictable.
trans-unit.target: 如果在代码中设置此值，则结果是不可预知的。

trans-unit.source: Each release of ASP.NET might render HTML differently from earlier releases.
trans-unit.target: 每个版本的 ASP.NET 可能以不同的方式呈现 HTML，从早期版本。

trans-unit.source: For example, in ASP.NET 3.5, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control is `false`, by default, ASP.NET renders a `span` element whose `disabled` attribute is set to "disabled".
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 ASP.NET 3.5 中，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件是`false`，默认情况下，ASP.NET 呈现`span`元素其`disabled`属性设置为"disabled"。

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET 4, by default, the `span` element is rendered with a cascading style sheet (CSS) `class` attribute instead of the `disabled` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在 ASP.NET 4 中，默认情况下，`span`元素呈现的级联样式表 (CSS)`class`特性而不是`disabled`属性。

trans-unit.source: This lets you specify the disabled appearance of the control and avoids rendering invalid HTML.
trans-unit.target: 这允许您指定的已禁用的控件的外观，避免呈现无效的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: (In HTML 4.0 and XHTML 1.1, the `span` element does not support the `disabled` attribute.)
trans-unit.target: (在 HTML 4.0 和 XHTML 1.1`span`元素不支持`disabled`属性。)

trans-unit.source: A Web application might include code that would not function correctly if HTML rendering changes.
trans-unit.target: Web 应用程序可能包含如果 HTML 呈现更改将无法正常运行的代码。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, you can set the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute of the `pages` element in the Web.config file to indicate which earlier version you want to maintain compatibility with.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此问题，可以设置`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`属性`pages`Web.config 文件，以指示你想要保持与兼容性的早期版本中的元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property to `3.5`, a disabled <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control will render a `disabled` attribute and not a CSS class.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>属性`3.5`，已禁用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件将呈现`disabled`属性而不是 CSS 类。

trans-unit.source: The earliest version that you can set this property to is `3.5`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将此属性设置为最早版本是`3.5`。

trans-unit.source: To maintain backward compatibility, when you use Visual Studio to upgrade a Web project to ASP.NET 4 from an earlier version, Visual Studio automatically sets the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute in the Web.config file to `3.5`.
trans-unit.target: 若要维护向后兼容，当你使用 Visual Studio 从早期版本升级到 ASP.NET 4 的 Web 项目时，Visual Studio 会自动设置`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`到 Web.config 文件中的属性`3.5`。

trans-unit.source: If you want an upgraded Web site to render HTML using the algorithm that was introduced in ASP.NET 4, you can change or remove the `controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要使用 ASP.NET 4 中引入的算法呈现 HTML 的升级的 Web 站点，你可以更改或删除`controlRenderingCompatibilityVersion`属性。

trans-unit.source: Most of the time, the behavior controlled by this property is automatic and you do not have to check the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property in your code.
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，此属性控制的行为是自动，则不需要检查<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>在代码中的属性。

trans-unit.source: However, if you are programming a custom control, you might have to include code that alters the control's behavior based on the setting of this property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果正在自定义控件进行编程，你可能需要包括将根据此属性的设置的控件的行为更改的代码。

trans-unit.source: For example, a custom control for ASP.NET 4 might be composed of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controls, and the custom control might specify the disabled appearance of the control by generating JavaScript code that alters the `aspNetDisabled` class.
trans-unit.target: 例如，为 ASP.NET 4 的自定义控件可能组成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件和自定义控件可能通过生成更改的 JavaScript 代码来指定控件的已禁用的外观`aspNetDisabled`类。

trans-unit.source: This will work as expected if <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> is `4.0` or later.
trans-unit.target: 这将作为预期如果工作<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>是`4.0`或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: But to get the same effect when <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> is `3.5`, the custom control's code must set the control's `CssClass` property to "aspNetDisabled" when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 但若要获取相同时生效<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>是`3.5`，自定义控件的代码必须设置控件的`CssClass`属性设置为"aspNetDisabled"时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A>属性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control adapter responsible for rendering the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 获取负责呈现指定控件的控件适配器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter" /> that will render the control.
trans-unit.target: 将呈现控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter" />。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Web pages are viewable across a wide range of devices that are capable of requesting pages from the Web.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET Web 页是可以看到跨各种设备能够从 Web 请求页面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveAdapter%2A> method returns the control adapter responsible for rendering the control on the specific browser or device that requested the ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveAdapter%2A>方法返回了控件适配器负责呈现特定浏览器或设备上的控件请求 ASP.NET 页。

trans-unit.source: The specific adapter type returned depends on the descendent type of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class that is being rendered.
trans-unit.target: 依赖于的子代类型时，返回了特定的适配器类型<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>呈现的类。

trans-unit.source: For more information about adapters, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).
trans-unit.target: 有关适配器的详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。

trans-unit.source: A URL relative to the current page.
trans-unit.target: 相对于当前页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets a URL that can be used by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 获取浏览器可以使用的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A fully qualified URL to the specified resource suitable for use on the browser.
trans-unit.target: 适合用于浏览器的指定资源的完全限定 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A> method to return a URL string suitable for use by the client to access resources on the Web server, such as image files, links to additional pages, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveClientUrl%2A>方法以返回 URL 字符串适用于使用从客户端访问资源在 Web 服务器上，如图像文件链接到其他页，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: The URL returned by this method is relative to the folder containing the source file in which the control is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的 URL 是相对于包含该控件进行实例化的源文件的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Controls that inherit this property, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>, will return a fully qualified URL relative to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如继承此属性的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MasterPage>，将返回相对于控件的完全限定的 URL。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="relativeUrl" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="relativeUrl" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The URL associated with the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory" /> 属性相关联的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Converts a URL into one that is usable on the requesting client.
trans-unit.target: 将 URL 转换为在请求客户端可用的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The converted URL.
trans-unit.target: 转换后的 URL。

trans-unit.source: If the `relativeUrl` parameter contains an absolute URL, the URL is returned unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果`relativeUrl`参数包含一个绝对 URL，URL 不经更改即返回。

trans-unit.source: If the `relativeUrl` parameter contains a relative URL, that URL is changed to a relative URL that is correct for the current request path, so that the browser can resolve the URL.
trans-unit.target: 如果`relativeUrl`参数包含相对 URL，则 URL 将变为适合当前的请求路径，以便浏览器可以解析 URL 的相对 URL。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider the following scenario:
trans-unit.target: 例如，考虑以下情况：

trans-unit.source: A client has requested an ASP.NET page that contains a user control that has an image associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 客户端已请求 ASP.NET 页，其中包含有与之关联的映像的用户控件。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page is located at /Store/page1.aspx.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 页位于 /Store/page1.aspx。

trans-unit.source: The user control is located at /Store/UserControls/UC1.ascx.
trans-unit.target: 用户控件位于 /Store/UserControls/UC1.ascx。

trans-unit.source: The image file is located at /UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg.
trans-unit.target: 图像文件位于 /UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg。

trans-unit.source: If the user control passes the relative path to the image (that is, /Store/UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg) to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveUrl%2A> method, the method will return the value /Images/Image1.jpg.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户控件将映像 (即，/Store/UserControls/Images/Image1.jpg) 的相对路径传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveUrl%2A>方法，该方法将返回值 /Images/Image1.jpg。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property to resolve to the absolute URL.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A>属性解析为的绝对 URL。

trans-unit.source: The returned URL is for client use.
trans-unit.target: 返回的 URL 仅供客户端使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information on resource paths in a Web site, see [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd).
trans-unit.target: 有关 Web 站点中的资源路径的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 项目路径](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd)。

trans-unit.source: For mobile Web pages only, if your application relies on cookieless sessions or might receive requests from mobile browsers that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde ("~") in a path can result in inadvertently creating a new session and potentially losing session data.
trans-unit.target: 移动 Web 页仅，如果你的应用程序依赖于无 cookie 会话，或者可能会收到来自移动浏览器的要求无 cookie 会话的请求，使用波形符 ("~") 在路径可能导致无意中创建新的会话并有可能丢失会话数据。

trans-unit.source: To set a property with a path such as "~/*path"*, resolve the path by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A> with an argument such as "~/*path"* before assigning it to the property.
trans-unit.target: 设置具有路径的属性，如"~ /*路径"*，通过调用解析路径<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl.ResolveUrl%2A>具有自变量，如"~ /*路径"*之前将其分配给属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> Web server control object and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveUrl%2A> method to set the path to the image, which is stored by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>Web 服务器控件对象，并使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ResolveUrl%2A>方法将路径设置到映像存储<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the <paramref name="relativeUrl" /> parameter contains <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <paramref name="relativeUrl" /> 参数包含 <see langword="null" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: Saves any server control state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 保存将页面回发到服务器之后发生的所有服务器控件状态更改。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current state.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器控件的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: If there is no state associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与该控件关联的状态，则此方法返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveControlState%2A> method to save state information required for the operation of a specific control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveControlState%2A>方法以将保存所需的特定控件的操作的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: This control-state data is stored separately from the control's view-state data.
trans-unit.target: 此控件状态数据从控件的视图状态数据分开存储。

trans-unit.source: Custom controls using control state must call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A> before saving control state.
trans-unit.target: 使用控件状态的自定义控件必须调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A>之前保存控件状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveControlState%2A> method in a custom ASP.NET control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例替代<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveControlState%2A>自定义 ASP.NET 控件中的方法。

trans-unit.source: When this method is invoked, it determines whether the internal property `currentIndex` is set to a non-default value and, if so, saves the value to control state.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此方法时，它确定是否内部属性`currentIndex`设置为非默认值，并且如果是这样，将值保存到控件状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method is overridden to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A> to indicate that the custom control uses control state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>重写方法以调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.RegisterRequiresControlState%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A>以指示该自定义控件使用控件状态。

trans-unit.source: When control state is saved, a string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML <see langword="HIDDEN" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 保存控件状态后，一个字符串对象返回到客户端作为变量存储在 HTML<see langword="HIDDEN" />元素。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to extract the state information to use in your control.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以提取要在控件中使用的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Control state is intended for small amounts of critical data, such as a page index or a keyword.
trans-unit.target: 控件状态旨在用于少量的关键数据，如页索引或关键字。

trans-unit.source: Using control state for large amounts of data can adversely affect page performance.
trans-unit.target: 将控件状态用于大量的数据可以产生不良影响页的性能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: Saves any server control view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 保存将页面回发到服务器之后发生的所有服务器控件视图状态更改。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器控件的当前视图状态。

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态是服务器控件的属性的值的累计。

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: 这些值会自动放置在服务器控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>属性，它是实例的<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>类。

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle.
