trans-unit.target: 保存状态的服务器控件生命周期阶段后，此属性的值随后会保存到一个字符串对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页面生命周期概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `HIDDEN` element.
trans-unit.target: 视图状态保存时，此字符串对象返回到客户端作为变量存储在 HTML`HIDDEN`元素。

trans-unit.source: When you author a custom server control with a custom view state, the view state can be managed explicitly with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 在创作一个自定义服务器的自定义视图状态时，可以显式管理的视图状态与<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: For information on implementing a custom session-state provider, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66).
trans-unit.target: 有关实现自定义会话状态提供程序的信息，请参阅[实现会话状态存储提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A> method in a custom ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A>自定义的 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的方法。

trans-unit.source: When this method is invoked, it determines whether the control has any child controls and whether the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object is the result of a postback.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此方法时，它确定控件是否有任何子控件，以及是否包含<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>对象是回发的结果。

trans-unit.source: If both are true, it changes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> Web server control to read `Custom Control Has Saved State`.
trans-unit.target: 如果都为 true，它更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.Text%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>Web 服务器控件读取`Custom Control Has Saved State`。

trans-unit.source: It then saves the view state of the control as an array of objects, named `allStates`.
trans-unit.target: 它然后将控件的视图状态保存为一个数组对象，名为`allStates`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing the design-time data for the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件的设计时数据的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets design-time data for a control.
trans-unit.target: 为控件设置设计时数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SetDesignModeState%2A> method saves design-time data for a control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SetDesignModeState%2A>方法保存的控件的设计时数据。

trans-unit.source: You must override this method to save the design-time data your control requires.
trans-unit.target: 你必须重写此方法来保存你的控件要求设计时数据。

trans-unit.source: The information necessary to pass to the delegate so that it can render the server control.
trans-unit.target: 传递给委托以便呈现服务器控件所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: Assigns an event handler delegate to render the server control and its content into its parent control.
trans-unit.target: 分配事件处理程序委托，以将服务器控件及其内容呈现到父控件中。

trans-unit.source: This method is supplied for implementation purposes only; you should never call it directly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供仅; 用于实现你应永远不会直接调用它。

trans-unit.source: Sets trace data for design-time tracing of rendering data.
trans-unit.target: 为呈现数据的设计时追踪设置跟踪数据。

trans-unit.source: The trace data key.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪数据键。

trans-unit.source: The trace data value.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪数据值。

trans-unit.source: Sets trace data for design-time tracing of rendering data, using the trace data key and the trace data value.
trans-unit.target: 使用跟踪数据键和跟踪数据值，为呈现数据的设计时追踪设置跟踪数据。

trans-unit.source: The traced object.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪对象。

trans-unit.source: The trace data key.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪数据键。

trans-unit.source: The trace data value.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪数据值。

trans-unit.source: Sets trace data for design-time tracing of rendering data, using the traced object, the trace data key, and the trace data value.
trans-unit.target: 使用跟踪对象、跟踪数据键和跟踪数据值，为呈现数据的设计时追踪设置跟踪数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the container that hosts the current control when rendered on a design surface.
trans-unit.target: 获取容器信息，该容器在呈现于设计图面上时承载当前控件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> that contains information about the container that the control is hosted in.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" />，包含承载控件的容器的信息。

trans-unit.source: A site binds a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> object to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> object and enables communication between the two.
trans-unit.target: 站点将绑定<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>对象传递给<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>对象并启用这两者之间的通信。

trans-unit.source: It also provides a way for the container to manage its components.
trans-unit.target: 它还提供一种要管理其组件的容器的方法。

trans-unit.source: The control is a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 该控件为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Substitution" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the skin to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用于控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: The name of the skin to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于控件外观的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Skins available to a control are contained in one or more skin files in a theme directory.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用控件的外观包含在主题目录中的一个或多个外观文件中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property specifies which of these skins to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>属性指定哪些这些将应用于控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: A skin is specific to a particular control; you cannot share skin settings between controls of different types.
trans-unit.target: 外观是特定于特定的控件;不能共享之间的不同类型的控件的外观设置。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property, a control uses the default skin if one is defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果你未设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>属性，如果已定义控件使用的默认外观。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a skin without an ID is defined for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control, then that skin applies to all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> controls that do not explicitly reference a skin by ID and that are not set to disable themes.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果而无需外观 ID 为定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制，则该外观适用于所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控件，不显式引用它按 ID 的外观和，未设置为禁用的主题。

trans-unit.source: If a skin with an ID is defined for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control, then that skin applies only to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> controls whose <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property is set to that ID.
trans-unit.target: 如果为定义具有 ID 的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制，则该外观仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>控制其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>属性设置为该 id。

trans-unit.source: If the skin files in a theme directory do not contain a skin with the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果主题目录中的外观文件不包含具有指定的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>属性，<xref:System.ArgumentException>在运行时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The style sheet has already been applied.
trans-unit.target: 已经应用了样式表。

trans-unit.source: \- or -

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the template that contains this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对包含该控件的模板的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" /> instance that contains this control.
trans-unit.target: 包含该控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> instance is part of a control template, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateControl%2A> property contains a reference to the containing control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>实例属于控件模板，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateControl%2A>属性包含对包含控件的引用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl?displayProperty=nameWithType> documentation.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl?displayProperty=nameWithType>文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets the virtual directory of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> or <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UserControl" /> that contains the current server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含当前服务器控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.UserControl" /> 的虚拟目录。

trans-unit.source: The virtual directory of the page or user control that contains the server control.
trans-unit.target: 包含服务器控件的页或用户控件的虚拟目录。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property specifies the path to the page or user control that contains the current control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A>属性指定的路径包含当前控件的页或用户控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the Web page resides at http://www.contoso.com/application/subdirectory, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property returns "application/subdirectory".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 Web 页位于http://www.contoso.com/application/subdirectory、<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A>属性返回"应用程序/子目录"。

trans-unit.source: To return the application-relative virtual path ("~/subdirectory"), use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回相对于应用程序虚拟路径 ("~ / 子目录")，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.AppRelativeTemplateSourceDirectory%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A> property twice.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TemplateSourceDirectory%2A>属性两次。

trans-unit.source: The first time it is used in a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.MapPathSecure%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method call to obtain the path to the directory in which the control resides.
trans-unit.target: 第一次在中使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.MapPathSecure%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法调用，以获取在其中控件所在的目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: The second time it is in a <xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method call to obtain the list of all the files contained within that directory.
trans-unit.target: 在第二次<xref:System.IO.Directory.GetFiles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法调用，以获取该目录中包含的所有文件的列表。

trans-unit.source: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 导致跟踪服务器控件的视图状态的更改，以便这些更改可以存储到服务器控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 对象中。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> 属性可访问此对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is called automatically at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event in the server control's lifecycle.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的末尾自动调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>中服务器控件的生命周期事件。

trans-unit.source: Invoke this method when you develop templated data-bound controls.
trans-unit.target: 当你开发模板化数据绑定控件时，请调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method alerts ASP.NET to monitor changes to a server control's view state, which is required when you override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提醒 ASP.NET 监视服务器控件的视图状态，则重写时是必需的更改<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method in a custom ASP.NET server control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>自定义的 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的方法。

trans-unit.source: It begins by calling the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A> method and then uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Clear%2A> method to delete all the child controls and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A> method to delete any saved view-state settings for those child controls.
trans-unit.target: 它首先调用基<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnDataBinding%2A>方法，然后使用<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Clear%2A>方法来删除所有子控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClearChildViewState%2A>方法以都删除所有视图状态的设置保存这些子控件。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 最后，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The control then uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property to determine whether view-state change tracking is enabled for the control.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该控件使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>属性来确定是否为控件启用视图状态更改跟踪。

trans-unit.source: If it is not enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果未启用，<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique, hierarchically qualified identifier for the server control.
trans-unit.target: 获取服务器控件的唯一的、以分层形式限定的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified identifier for the server control.
trans-unit.target: 服务器控件的完全限定标识符。

trans-unit.source: This property differs from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property, in that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> property includes the identifier for the server control's naming container.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不同于<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>属性包含服务器控件的命名容器的标识符。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is generated automatically when a page request is processed.
trans-unit.target: 处理的页面请求时，将自动生成此标识符。

trans-unit.source: This property is particularly important in differentiating server controls contained within a data-binding server control that repeats.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是特别重要区分重复的数据绑定服务器控件中包含的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The repeating control, which are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> Web server controls (or any custom server controls that you create that include repeating functionality when data bound), serves as the naming container for its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 重复的控制，它们是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>Web 服务器控件 （或你创建包含数据绑定时重复功能的任何自定义服务器控件），作为服务命名及其子控件的容器。

trans-unit.source: This means that it creates a unique namespace for its child controls so that their <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property values do not conflict.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着它的唯一命名空间为创建它的子控件，以便其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性值不会发生冲突。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you include an ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> Web server control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> server control, and assign the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property value of `MyLabel`, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> of `MyRepeater`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果包括 ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> Web 服务器控件中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>服务器控件和分配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性值`MyLabel`，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater><xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>的`MyRepeater`.

trans-unit.source: If you bind data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object with three entries, the resulting <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> properties for each instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> server controls are `MyRepeater$ctl00$MyLabel`, `MyRepeater$ctl01$MyLabel`, and `MyRepeater$ctl02$MyLabel`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将数据绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>具有三个项，生成的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>的每个实例的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>服务器控件是`MyRepeater$ctl00$MyLabel`， `MyRepeater$ctl01$MyLabel`，和`MyRepeater$ctl02$MyLabel`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object and populates it with three text strings, then binds a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> Web server control to the data in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> when the page is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>对象和三个文本字符串，并用其填充它，然后将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>Web 服务器控件中的数据<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>加载页时。

trans-unit.source: The code gets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A> property for each child control generated during data binding.
trans-unit.target: 此代码可获取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.UniqueID%2A>为每个数据绑定生成的子控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: The code generates three versions of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control and writes their `UniqueID` property values to the page.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中生成三个版本的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件并将其`UniqueID`属性值写入页面。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the server control is unloaded from memory.
trans-unit.target: 当服务器控件从内存中卸载时发生。

trans-unit.source: Server controls must perform any final clean-up, such as closing files, database connections and discarding objects, during this stage of the control lifecycle before the instance is unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 服务器控件必须执行任何最终清理，如关闭文件、 数据库连接和对象，放弃控制生命周期中卸载实例之前的此阶段。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control checks client input from the browser for potentially dangerous values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示控件是否检查来自浏览器的客户端输入是否具有潜在危险值的值。

trans-unit.source: A value that determines whether the control checks client input.
trans-unit.target: 确定控制器是否检查客户输入的值。

trans-unit.source: Values can include <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Disabled" />, <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Enabled" />, and <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Inherit" />.
trans-unit.target: 值可以包括 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Disabled" />、<see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Enabled" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Inherit" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Inherit" />, which means that the control gets the value from its parent.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ValidateRequestMode.Inherit" />，这意味着控件从其父级获取值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about request validation, see <xref:System.Web.UnvalidatedRequestValues>.
trans-unit.target: 有关请求验证的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UnvalidatedRequestValues>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a server control across multiple requests for the same page.
trans-unit.target: 获取状态信息的字典，这些信息使您可以在同一页的多个请求间保存和还原服务器控件的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> class that contains the server control's view-state information.
trans-unit.target: 包含服务器控件视图状态信息的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: A server control's view state is the accumulation of all its property values.
trans-unit.target: 服务器控件的视图状态是其所有属性值的累计。

trans-unit.source: In order to preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class, to store the property values.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 HTTP 请求之间保留这些值，ASP.NET 服务器控件使用此属性，它是实例的<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>类中，以存储属性值。

trans-unit.source: The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML hidden input element when subsequent requests are processed.
trans-unit.target: 处理后续请求时，值是作为变量传递给 HTML 隐藏输入元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information about saving server control view state, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关保存服务器控件视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: View state is enabled for all server controls by default, but there are circumstances in which you will want to disable it.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，情况下，启用所有服务器控件的视图状态但是某些情况下在其中你将想要禁用它。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 性能概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。

trans-unit.source: For information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872).
trans-unit.target: 有关字典和如何使用它们的信息，请参阅[集合和数据结构](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates implementing a `Text` property that stores and retrieves its value from its control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何实现`Text`属性用于存储和检索其值从其控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 对象是否不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> instance is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 实例不区分大小写，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you create a custom server control that saves its view state without taking case into account.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建一个保存其视图状态，而不考虑大小写的自定义服务器控件，重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: When you do so multiple objects with the same key, but with different casing, can be stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用相同的密钥，但具有不同大小写，因此多个对象执行时，可以存储在<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>与关联<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateIgnoresCase%2A> property to return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateIgnoresCase%2A>属性以返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the view-state mode of this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此控件的视图状态模式。

trans-unit.source: The view-state mode of this control.
trans-unit.target: 此控件的视图状态模式。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property to enable view state for an individual control even if view state is disabled for the page.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>属性来启用的单个控件的视图状态，即使页禁用了视图状态。

trans-unit.source: For more information about view state and control state, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关视图状态和控件状态的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To disable view state for a page and to enable it for a specific control on the page, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property of the page and the control to `true`, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property of the page to <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Disabled>, and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property of the control to <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>.
trans-unit.target: 若要禁用页面的视图状态并使其成为特定控件在页上，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>页面和控件的属性`true`，将其设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>属性页面的到<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Disabled>，并设置<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>属性控制对<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property for a page is <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>属性页是<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property for a Web server control in a page is <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Inherit>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>在页中的 Web 服务器控件的属性是<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Inherit>。

trans-unit.source: As a result, if you do not set this property at either the page or the control level, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property determines view-state behavior.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果未设置此属性页或控制级别，值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>属性确定视图状态行为。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property of a page or a control has an effect only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>页或控件的属性具有效果才<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is set to `false`, view state will be turned off even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>属性设置为`false`，即使将关闭视图状态<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewStateMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode.Enabled>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property to a value that is not in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将此属性设置为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ViewStateMode" /> 枚举值以外的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a server control is rendered as UI on the page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示服务器控件是否作为 UI 呈现在页上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is visible on the page; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件在页上可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, the server control is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`false`，不呈现服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: You should take this into account when organizing the layout of your page.
trans-unit.target: 组织你页的布局时，应考虑到这种情况。

trans-unit.source: If a container control is not rendered, any controls that it contains will not be rendered even if you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property of an individual control to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不呈现容器控件，即使你设置将不会呈现它包含任何控件<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>到的单个控件的属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the individual control returns `false` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A> property even if you have explicitly set it to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，单个控件返回`false`为<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A>属性即使你具有显式将其设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: (That is, if the `Visible` property of the parent control is set to `false`, the child control inherits that setting and the setting takes precedence over any local setting.)
trans-unit.target: (即，如果`Visible`父控件的属性设置为`false`，子控件继承该设置，该设置将优先于任何本地设置。)
